alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 1:56AM EST until December 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and very heavy lake effect snow will produce life threatening conditions. Storm total snow accumulations of 4 to 5 feet across the Buffalo Metro area, and 1 to 3 feet in surrounding areas. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. Wind chills as cold as 15 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Niagara, Orleans, Erie, and Genesee counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible in the lake effect snow band. Areas of blowing snow will produce zero visibility. Very strong winds will cause extensive tree damage and power outages. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Strong winds will cause significant blowing and drifting snow, frequently reducing visibilities to zero. Travel is strongly discouraged.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie
